#  Investor Relations

### Company Overview

Leveraging our expertise in personal care electrical appliance industry, we aim to promote consumer lifestyles and drive the awareness of personal grooming. Through Raytech Holding’s wholly-owned subsidiary in Hong Kong, Pure Beauty, we principally engage in the sourcing and wholesaling of personal care electrical appliances for international brand owners. We also provide product design and development collaboration as a value-added service for our customers. Our current customers focus on marketing their personal care electrical appliances products mainly in Japan. Commencing our operation in 2013, we have accumulated over 10 years of experience in the industry. 

[Learn More](company-profile.htm)
